name: Belt of the Black Eagle
rules: 1, [Exhaust] Turn a resource you control face down -> Look at the top two cards of your deck. Put one into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

name: Deathchill Cloak
rules: When this armor prevents damage that would be dealt by an attacking ally, that ally can't ready while this armor remains in your control.

name: Magnificent Flying Carpet
rules: Tailoring Hero Required; You can control any number of locations. When you place a resource face up, you may ready all locations you control. (Mounts can't attack or be attacked.)
